examples:
QUERY (\x xs -> if length xs < 20 then x:xs else xs)
FROM films
AS json
TO json
RETURN all

QUERY (\x xs -> if isInfixOf "Howard Hall" (actors x) then x:xs else xs)
FROM films
AS json
TO json
RETURN all

QUERY (\x xs -> if title x == "Romeo and Juliet" then x:xs else xs)
FROM films
AS json
TO json
RETURN all

QUERY (\x newrdf -> if length (triplesOf newrdf) < 20 then addTriple newrdf x else newrdf)
FROM filmGraph
AS rdf
TO rdf
RETURN all
